game.title: Rescue the Princess
game.objective: Save the princess from the clutches of the evil dragon
game.description: The beautiful princess has been kidnapped by an evil dragon. You have been chosen as the brave knight to rescue her. Are you up for the challenge?
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and the eternal gratitude of the princess

tasks.objective: Find the hidden entrance to the dragon's lair
tasks.description: Search the caverns near the Blue Mountains for the hidden entrance that leads to the dragon's lair.

tasks.objective: Retrieve the enchanted sword from the enchanted forest
tasks.description: Bring back the legendary enchanted sword that has the power to slay dragons. The sword can be found deep within the mysterious enchanted forest.

tasks.objective: Slay the dragon and rescue the princess
tasks.description: Enter the dragon's lair, confront the fearsome creature, and defeat it in a fierce battle. Once the dragon is vanquished, free the princess and bring her back to her grateful father, the king.
